Name: Glossy Light Gray
Description: Sheaffer® VFM 9427 Glossy Light Gray Fountain Pen With PVD Gold-Tone Trim - Medium
Long description: The popular Sheaffer VFM makes an impact with its modern, tapered silhouette. It comes in a wide range of finishes from creative and colorful to smart and sophisticated. Its performance is backed by the Sheaffer White Dot, our symbol of writing excellence.

Name: Glossy PVD Gold
Description: Sheaffer® 100 9372 Glossy PVD Gold Fountain Pen With PVD Gold Trim - Medium
Long description: The Sheaffer 100 makes a great gift for celebrating an occasion or kicking off a new chapter. With its modern design, timeless finish options, and balanced feel, it is the perfect tool for letting ideas flow effortlessly onto the page. For anyone who enjoys writing, the Sheaffer 100 is an affordable way to bring that experience up a notch while also making an impression.

Name: Glossy Black 300 9312
Description: Sheaffer Gift Set Glossy Black 300 9312 Ballpoint Pen With Chrome Trim And Pen Pouch
Long description: This enticing gift set pairs a classic Sheaffer 300 ballpoint pen with a leather pen pouch. The Sheaffer 300 is boldly detailed with the iconic Sheaffer slotted clip and wide banding. The contemporary pen bears the Sheaffer White Dot, a symbol of writing excellence. Crafted from genuine leather featuring a sophisticated, black-milled texture, this sleek and practical single pen pouch is a must-have accessory.

Name: Fountain Pen Piston Converter
Description: Sheaffer® Fountain Pen Piston Converter Push-in Style - Smoke
Long description: This screw-action piston converter allows Sheaffer fountain pens to use bottled ink. It fits all Sheaffer fountain pens except those from the VFM collection.

Name: Rollerball Refill
Description: Sheaffer® Classic Rollerball Refill - Black Medium - Blister Card
Long description: Sheaffer refills are renowned for being highly reliable and convenient for use on all paper. This refill is compatible with Sheaffer rollerball pens from the Sheaffer Legacy Heritage and Prelude collections. It is not suitable for Sheaffer VFM rollerball pens.
